import.name: Darkvision
import.description: You are still able to see in pitch black conditions, however only in ${Grayscale}$, out to 48 studs.

import.name: Stone Cunning
import.description: Whenever you make an ${History}$ check related to the origin of stonework, you are considered proficient in the ${History}$ skill and add double your ${Proficiency Bonus}$ to the check, instead of your normal bonus.

import.name: Artisan Tool Proficiency: Smith's Tools
import.description: You are proficient with some artisian tools in this class.

import.name: Artisan Tool Proficiency: Brewer's Supplies
import.description: You are proficient with some artisian tools in this class.

import.name: Artisan Tool Proficiency: Masons's Tools
import.description: You are proficient with some artisian tools in this class.

import.name: Dwarven Resilience
import.description: You have ${Advantage}$ on saving throws against ${Poison}$, and you have resistance against ${Poison Damage}$.
